name: Bounce N Bang - Free Physics Puzzle
name_original: Bounce N Bang - Free Physics Puzzle
description:
One of a new and amazing concept in physics games. So addictive  that you won’t stop playing, but hey fewer than 10 percent of players have won. Try if YOU CAN ! It’s totally FREE ㋡.

 

A lot of shooting and bouncing of cannonball with aim to hit the target which separates it from other physics puzzles. All you have to do is target at castle and fire the cannon ✪ Bouncing off walls ball hits the target BANG !  You won! Sounds easy right. Well it looks simple but is not as easy which makes it such an addicting game.

 

When you shoot, ball should hit the castle with limited reflection - ball bounce off or bounce out every object but detonates itself when it stops or doesn't have a way to bounce off. With 50+ brain exercises in this physics game and a lot of other challenges ☠

 

It’s one of those addicting games that you can't stop playing, at first it looks like bubble shooter but with very different concept of physics puzzles, if you like one tap or one touch games this is going to be your next favorite ,as this game demands creative thinking more than moving your finger on screen.

 

 

Story:

It has a little fictional back story, here is a short version:

Long ago a village was attacked by an evil kingdom, to help those villagers restoring their peace, you have to fight enemy.

 

To fight them you only have a cannon and limited cannon balls, whereas enemy are safe in their castles, you have to shoot cannonballs at their castle blowing them up like in bubble shooter games you have to hit the right place, in some cases you even have bounce off cannonball from surroundings to hit the target but if its corner of object you might bounce out, so watch out.

 

After first 20 stages zormen dragon will be fighting against you, if you dare to fight they too have fire dragon. On newly updated levels king kong gorilla hits you with his growling, being a smart being he can also give you more than trouble you have thought.

 

Use your creativity to solve these puzzles avoiding all gorillas and dragons ! solving all puzzles ; collect coins in each level to get higher score. Score higher and unlock 4 unique power ups .These mind blowing powers will make your game more easier and addictive.

 

 

How to play

• Use touch or buttons to control cannon ✓.

• Solve the logical puzzles quickly for more points✓.

• Only one shot of cannonball required to blow your target ✓.

 

Unique features

•New and unique concept in physics puzzles

• 50+ brain exercises

• Great power ups

• Great family game

• Play offline

• Perfect for kids and adults alike

 

Things you should know

- Cannonball refills after time and can be bought with coins (in game currency).

- Aim directly or bounce off walls to reach your destination.

- While hitting at edges cannon ball will bounce out from your expected target.

- Perfect angle is a must.

 

Your feedback

Game is still getting updates , so your feedback on improvements will be appreciated, also in game gift for taking updates  .

So what are you waiting for, downloading this addicting game and start enjoying.

One of the best physics puzzles :)

 

*Internet access may be required. This application contains optional video advertisements that can be viewed to provide you additional rewards.
